name: Lazy Sunday
description:
Just a simple game about relaxing. You have the house all to yourself one day so you can do whatever you want even something crazy like eating all the bacon in the house. Careful though not everything is meant to be played around with. You also dont want to play around to much thats how you end up doing terrible terrible things..... like burning the bacon.  

This was a solo jam game made for the Epic mega jam #ue4. 

Gameplay Instructions :

WASD  to Move

Mouse to look around

E to interact. Some object also have an alt move that you can use with Left mouse,
